situation:
CE Board Nov. 2022
A concrete beam has a depth of 600mm and a width of 300mm. The concrete compressive strength, f'c is 34MPa and the tensile strength ft=3.4MPa.

subquestions.question: Calculate the cracking moment of the section.
If the beam is cast with provision for a 180mm diameter pipe located concentrically, calculate the new cracking moment of the section.
If the beam is cast with provision for a square duct 85mmx85mm locatead concentrically, calculate the new cracking moment of the section.
